>
[Conflux Focus](/Feats.aspx?ID=2875) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 48 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
conflux spells

</column>

---

You imagine how you'll weave magic and combat into future battles, improving your focus. If you have spent at least 2 Focus Points since the last time you Refocused, you recover 2 Focus Points when you Refocus instead of 1.

<title level="2">Conflux Focus leads to...</title>
[Conflux Wellspring](/Feats.aspx?ID=2882)
